issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Welcome: Setup on Windows is missing from CLI option

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: The CLI page only lists a Mac download. We need to provide Windows and Linux versions as well. http://web.appcelerator.com/product/cli
fields.summary: Windows/Linux node downloads missing from CLI page

comments.body:
The web page actually only shows the Node download based on your current platform:

https://github.com/appcelerator/appc-web-server/blob/master/web/views/cli.hbs#L60

We may wish to allow users to switch if the user agent should happen to be wrong.
